meanings.definition: In an honorary manner or capacity.
meanings.sent1: She was honorarily appointed as the team captain for the day.
meanings.sent2: He spoke honorarily at the ceremony to show his respect.
meanings.sent3: The cat sat honorarily on the throne, pretending to be the king.
meanings.sent4: The sun shone honorarily through the clouds, casting a golden glow.
meanings.sent5: The old man smiled honorarily at the children playing in the park.

meanings.definition: Conferred as an honor without the usual requirements or privileges.
meanings.sent1: The honorarily title was given to her for her years of service.
meanings.sent2: He received an honorarily medal for his bravery in the face of danger.
meanings.sent3: The honorarily award made her feel proud of her accomplishments.
meanings.sent4: The honorarily position allowed him to attend the exclusive event.
meanings.sent5: The honorarily certificate hung proudly on the wall of her office.
